name: Bane
text: Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt. Each affected creature takes a –1 penalty on attack rolls and a –1 penalty on saving throws against fear effects. Bane counters and dispels bless.
mythicText: The –1 penalty applies on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and all saving throws. Each affected creature must roll its next attack roll or saving throw twice and take the lower result.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
area_zh: 以你为中心, 半径50尺爆发范围
text_zh: 绝望术让你的敌人充满恐惧和疑惑。每个被影响生物的攻击检定受到-1减值，对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定受到-1减值。绝望术反制和解除‘祝福术 (bless)’。
mythicText_zh: 法术的-1减值会应用到攻击检定、武器伤害检定、以及所有豁免检定中。每个被影响的生物的下一次攻击检定或豁免检定都必须掷两次并取较低的结果。
